sentences.en: " I don't want to play a solo, " I said.
sentences.cn: “ 我不想独奏, ” 我说.

sentences.en: a gorgeous piano solo
sentences.cn: 一首极其美妙的钢琴独奏曲

sentences.en: a solo album
sentences.cn: 独唱专辑

sentences.en: a solo effort
sentences.cn: 独自的努力

sentences.en: A solo piper opens Aberdeen Highland Games at 10am and the main events start at 1pm.
sentences.cn: 上午10点，一位风笛独奏家揭开了阿伯丁高地运动会的序幕，下午1点主要比赛项目开始。

sentences.en: Brokaw solos brilliantly on this album.
sentences.cn: 布罗考在这张专辑中的独唱非常出色。

sentences.en: Every member contributes to the rap, singing either solo or as part of a rap chorus.
sentences.cn: 每个成员都参与到说唱中来，或者独唱，或者表演说唱乐中的和声部分。

sentences.en: He had just completed his final solo album.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚录完了他的最后一张独唱唱片。

sentences.en: He has acquired a reputation as this country's premier solo violinist.
sentences.cn: 他已经赢得了该国首席小提琴独奏家的名誉。

sentences.en: He plays a solo acoustic set.
sentences.cn: 他伴着原声乐器独唱了一组歌曲。

sentences.en: his first solo flight
sentences.cn: 他的首次单飞

sentences.en: In his horn solo, he kept modulating from key to key.
sentences.cn: 他在喇叭独奏时不断地变调.

sentences.en: It featured a solo dance in which a woman in a short overall mimed a lot of dainty housework.
sentences.cn: 它的亮点是一段独舞，一名身穿短罩衫的女子以哑剧形式优雅地表演了许多做家务的动作。

sentences.en: Sommers performed a flute solo a few weeks ago that got so-so reviews.
sentences.cn: 萨默斯几周前表演了一场长笛独奏，反映平平。

sentences.en: Tara is currently working on a solo album.
sentences.cn: 塔拉眼下正忙着制作个人专辑.

sentences.en: The original version featured a guitar solo.
sentences.cn: 吉他独奏是原版的特色。

sentences.en: The piece segues into his solo with the strings.
sentences.cn: 曲终后紧接着就是他的弦乐独奏。

sentences.en: There's wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony.
sentences.cn: 在交响乐中间有一段奇妙的抒情长笛独奏.

sentences.en: Tony Holmes wiped the smile off the faces of his rivals with a solo 30-second win.
sentences.cn: 托尼·福尔摩斯以30秒的领先优势获得了这一赛段的个人胜利，使对手再也笑不起来。

sentences.en: When did you first fly solo?
sentences.cn: 你第一次单独飞行是什么时候？

trans.tran_cn: 单独的，独自的，独唱的，独奏的
trans.tran_en: done alone without anyone else helping you
to perform a solo in a piece of music

trans.tran_cn: 独唱（曲），独奏（曲），单飞，单人表演
trans.tran_en: a piece of music for one performer
